title.rendered: Ras Al Khaimah International Airport (RKT) UAE Contact Details

content.rendered:
Ras Al Khaimah International Airport (RKT), UAE Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Ras Al Khaimah Airport Contact Number

Address: Ras Al Khaimah International Airport
P.O Box 501
RAS AL KHAIMAH
United Arab Emirates

Telephone: +971-7-2075200 / +971-7-2448111

Fax: +971-7-2448199

Email:  administration@rakairport.com

IATA Code: RKT

ICAO Code: OMRK

Website: http://www.rakairport.com/

View Location of Ras Al Khaimah Airport: https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Ras+Al+Khaimah+International+Airport+(RKT)/@25.6158559,55.9371963,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x3ef5dbf9ab06b443:0x9486d43c9f0f8ea0!8m2!3d25.6158559!4d55.939385

Ras Al Khaimah International Airport is located in the Persian Gulf sheikhdom of Ras al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates 11 nautical miles south of the town of the same name.

Facilities and Services at  Ras Al Khaimah Airport (RKT)

  • VIP Terminal and Lounges
  • Baggage Storage
  • Disabled facilities
  • Lost and Found
  • Police Station
  • ATM
  • Smoking Areas
  • Shops & Restaurants
  • Medical Servies
  • Worship
  • Wi-Fi
  • Free Parking
  • Cargo facilities
  • Taxi
  • Duty Free Shopping
  • Luggage

Medical Services at  Ras Al Khaimah Airport (RKT)

A nurse is available on duty incase we have any sick passengers. We also have ambulances and ambu-lift available,. In severe cases nearby hospitals can be contacted

For Emergency please contact the follwing Hotline Numbers:
a. SAQR HOSPITAL : +971 7 2223666
b. RAK Hospital : +971 7 2225555
c. SAIF Hospital : +971 7 2223555
d. Al Zahrawi Hospital: +971 7 2288544

Luggage & Check In at  Ras Al Khaimah Airport (RKT)

For any baggage regulations, please follow the below link

http://www.rakairport.com/luggage_checkin.html
